entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
